title: Aloe Vera Gel
steps: Apply fresh aloe vera gel on the affected area. Leave for 20 mins and rinse.

title: Honey & Lemon
steps: Mix 1 tsp honey with few drops of lemon. Apply on acne. Rinse after 15 mins.

title: Cucumber Slices
steps: Place cold cucumber slices on eyes for 10 minutes.

title: Besan & Turmeric
steps: Mix besan, turmeric, and rosewater. Apply, dry, and wash.

title: Green Tea Bags
steps: Refrigerate used tea bags and place on eyes for 15 mins.

title: Tomato Pulp
steps: Apply fresh tomato pulp on face for 10 mins. Rinse with cold water.

title: Yogurt & Honey
steps: Mix yogurt with honey. Apply for 15 mins. Wash with lukewarm water.

title: Papaya Paste
steps: Mash papaya, apply to face. Leave for 20 mins then rinse.

title: Potato Juice
steps: Apply raw potato juice daily for 15 mins before rinsing.

title: Mint Leaves Paste
steps: Grind mint leaves and apply on affected areas overnight.

title: Rose Water
steps: Use rose water as toner or spritz during the day.

title: Ice Cube Rub
steps: Wrap ice in cloth and rub for a minute daily.

title: Multani Mitti
steps: Mix with water or rose water. Apply for 15 mins.

title: Banana Peel
steps: Rub inside of banana peel on scars. Leave for 10 mins.

title: Coconut Oil
steps: Apply before bedtime. Wash off in the morning.

title: Sandalwood Paste
steps: Apply paste on pimples for 10 mins then wash.

title: Oatmeal Scrub
steps: Mix oatmeal with milk. Scrub gently and rinse.

title: Rice Water
steps: Use rice water as toner daily for glow.

title: Orange Peel Powder
steps: Mix with yogurt. Apply as face pack for 10 mins.

title: Neem Paste
steps: Apply neem paste on acne for 15 mins daily.

title: Baking Soda
steps: Mix with water and scrub gently. Rinse well.

title: Gram Flour & Yogurt
steps: Mix and apply for 15 mins, then wash.

title: Avocado Mask
steps: Mash and apply for 20 mins, then rinse.

title: Cinnamon & Honey
steps: Apply mix on acne spots for 15 mins.

title: Turmeric & Milk
steps: Apply paste on face. Leave for 10 mins and wash.
